definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_in_bed</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">250</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Good Morning!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="debug_marker"><field name="NAME">marker1</field></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
